timeline.message:
Update dependencies
- Dropwizard 2.0.12 -> 2.0.13
- gRPC 1.31.1 -> 1.32.1
- grpc-kotlin-stub 0.1.5 -> 0.2.0
- Micrometer 1.5.4 -> 1.5.5
- Netty 4.1.51.FINAL -> 4.1.52.FINAL
  - netty-tcnative-boringssl-static 2.0.31.Final -> 2.0.34.Final
- Tomcat 9.0.37 -> 9.0.38
- org.jetbrains.kotlinx 1.3.8 -> 1.3.9
- Spring 5.2.8.RELEASE -> 5.2.9.RELEASE
- Spring Boot 2.3.3.RELEASE -> 2.3.4.RELEASE

- Build
  - akka-actor-typed_2.13 2.6.8 -> 2.6.9
  - Checkstyle 8.35 -> 8.36.1
  - Eureka 1.9.25 -> 1.9.26
  - Finagle 20.8.0 -> 20.8.1
  - jmh-core 1.25 -> 1.25.2
  - jmh-gradle-plugin 0.5.0 -> 0.5.1
  - json-unit 2.18.1 -> 2.19.0
  - Junit 5.6.2 -> 5.7.0
  - ktlint-gradle 9.3.0 -> 9.4.0
  - Mockito 3.5.2 -> 3.5.11
  - testNG 7.1.0 -> 7.3.0
- Examples
  - Dagger 2.28.3 -> 2.29.1
  - monix-reactive_2.13 3.2.2+43-36c1ada8 -> 3.2.2+45-5c6c8b9e
  - org.jetbrains.kotlin 1.3.72 -> 1.7.40

timeline.author: ikhoon
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -157,21 +158,21 @@ com.thesamet.scalapb:
 
 # Akka is used only for testing in it:grpcweb module.
 com.typesafe.akka:
-  akka-actor-typed_2.13: { version: &TYPESAFE_AKKA_VERSION '2.6.8' }
+  akka-actor-typed_2.13: { version: &TYPESAFE_AKKA_VERSION '2.6.9' }
   akka-discovery_2.13: { version: *TYPESAFE_AKKA_VERSION }
   akka-stream_2.13: { version: *TYPESAFE_AKKA_VERSION }
 
 # Finagle is used only for testing in zookeeper module.
 com.twitter:
   finagle-serversets_2.13:
-    version: '20.8.0'
+    version: '20.8.1'
 
 gradle.plugin.net.davidecavestro:
   gradle-jxr-plugin: { version: '0.2.1' }
 
 io.dropwizard:
   dropwizard-core:
-    version: &DROPWIZARD_VERSION '2.0.12'
+    version: &DROPWIZARD_VERSION '2.0.13'
     javadocs:
     - https://www.javadoc.io/doc/io.dropwizard/dropwizard-core/2.0.12/
